name: Thiire
description:
A night to never forget! The best party game to get to know your friends better and having in the process! Play with as many people as you'd like!

Different difficulties to make the game extra spicy. Careful with what difficulty you pick.

Available in eight different languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese en Italian.

★ Countless Truth or Dare questions!
★ Play with as many people as you'd like!
★ Add your own truth or dares!
★ Four different difficulties!
★ Set player names to distinguish who is playing.
